programme.title: Nine Divine
programme.desc: A shy foster girl escapes her painful life through art, but when her baby brother disappears, she must find him quickly while others begin to question her sanity.

programme.title: Expect the Unexpected
programme.desc: After years of hiding his deepest, darkest secrets, Jeff's world starts to fall apart when his past returns to haunt him.

programme.title: Rise Up Black Man
programme.desc: Two best friends rise up against a charismatic conman exploiting their community in a daunting struggle for the greater good.

programme.title: JK's House
programme.desc: At JK’s House, Dr. Amber Jenkins (Robin Givens) and JK blend family values and life lessons with music and dance.

programme.title: Thankful for My Family
programme.desc: In a heartwarming tale, Stuart Jones navigates the intricacies of love and family, seeking their blessing in a charming Thanksgiving encounter.

programme.title: Maya & Her Lover
programme.desc: A lonely woman burdened by her past begins a passionate affair with a 22-year-old struggling to subdue his own demons.

programme.title: Southeast 67
programme.desc: Spanning 20 years, Southeast 67 follows a group of African American students from Washington, D.C. who were promised college scholarships in 1988 at the age of twelve, yet struggled with survival in a neighborhood devastated by the crack epidemic

programme.title: Mutiny
programme.desc: A story of WW1 and the Black struggle for pride and freedom. Eyewitness testimonies of surviving veterans, official documents, and archive photos reveal the incredible story of the British West Indies Regiment.

programme.title: 2 Pac Assassination: Battle For Compton
programme.desc: Two decades after Tupac and Biggie's deaths, a documentary digs into the unsolved cases, revealing potential culprits and the reasons behind the lack of closure.

programme.title: Look Away, Look Away
programme.desc: After a racist murders nine black churchgoers in South Carolina, this award-winning film follows the fierce battle in Mississippi to determine the fate of the state flag with the most powerful and divisive symbol of the Confederacy.

programme.title: Partners of the Heart
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of segregation, Vivien Thomas, a black carpenter with a genius for surgery, and Dr. Alfred Blalock, a renowned white surgeon, dared to defy medical gospel by forging a partnership that changed the course of medical history.

programme.title: Issues of the Heart
programme.desc: A woman’s battle with infertility tests her faith in ways that strain her marriage and raise her husband’s suspicions.

programme.title: Yankee Hustle
programme.desc: A quick-witted dramedy showcasing the explosive and hilarious journey of three African immigrants as they navigate the treacherous waters of legal status, social awkwardness, romance, and challenging friendships while maintaining their cultural pride.

programme.title: American Comic
programme.desc: Eight comedians take the stage for a laughter-filled celebration of diversity and humor in the heart of Washington D.C.

programme.title: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: A gripping tale of love, betrayal, and redemption that explores the transformative power of facing truth and embracing vulnerability in the face of adversity.
